channel.title: 508 Client stops loading at "connecting to update server"
channel.description: I have 2 508 clients downloaded on my computer but both do not work. I click "run", and it asks me for the ip, I input the ip, it loads until it says "connecting to update server" and just stops. I can just leave it there for an hour and it won't change.

item.title: 508 Client stops loading at "connecting to update server"
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

Well in run.bat it has this written in it:

@echo off
java loader
pause

item.source: 508 Client stops loading at "connecting to update server"

item.title: 508 Client stops loading at "connecting to update server"
item.dc:creator: @k_space_0 k space 0
item.description:
@k_space_0 wrote:

right click compile and click edit…change “jdk6.0.1_##” to “djk6.0.1.(your jdk version)”
then right click run and if it says something like program files…jre1.0.6 or something like that change it to jre(your jre version) and click save then run your server and go to your client and run your client and im sure it will connect

~k space~

Read full topic

when it doesnt connect it means that server you are trying to connect to is down.
